field.name: Title
field.description: Add a title (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Hide title
field.description: Select to hide the title

field.name: Subtitle
field.description: Add a title (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Button label
field.description: Add button label

field.name: Products count
field.description: How many product do you want the showcase

field.name: Image aspect ratio
field.description: For well-cropped image, select an image aspect ratio that matches your content

field.name: Layout
field.description: Select how you want your content to be displayed (Left/Right is only shown on desktop)

field.name: Type
field.description: What should the product list be based upon?

option.name: Related products (One slider/grid for each group)

field.name: Products to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific products for the relation

field.name: Products to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific products for the relation

field.name: Groups to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific groups for the relation

field.name: Groups to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific groups for the relation

field.name: Groups to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific groups for the relation

field.name: Products
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose specific products for the relation

field.name: Products to relate to
field.description: If this paragraph is NOT placed on the product detail page, use this to choose a specific product for the relation. Only 1 product supported!

field.name: New badge
field.description: Shown when product is newer than X publication days

field.name: New publication days
field.description: From product created date to X amount of days (Optional)

field.name: Sale Badge
field.description: Automatically shown on products that have a discount

field.name: Sale type
field.description: Percentage is a calculation based on the product discount

field.name: Campaign Badges
field.description: Campaign badges are shown on products where they are enabled (New and Sale badges don't need to be selected)

field.name: Product theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style each product item

field.name: Image theme
field.description: Select a theme (background) to style the product image background

field.name: Button style
field.description: Select a button style

field.name: Space around
field.description: Adjust the spacing for well-aligned content

field.name: Title size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Subtitle size
field.description: Do you want to make your subtitle font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Text readability
field.description: Having the right amount of characters on each line is key to readability. This setting is activated by default and will shorten the number of characters on each line. We encourage you to have it on if you find yourself having to move your neck/head to read the text in a single column. Otherwise, disable it and the text will then be limited by the column width.

field.name: Product list page (optional)
field.description: Uses PageNavigationTag: "Shop" as default

field.name: Product details page (optional)
field.description: Select the primary details page. Uses PageNavigationTag: "ProductDetailPage" as default

field.name: Product slider service page (optional)
field.description: Uses PageNavigationTag: "ProductSliderService" as default
